title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 381.8 - Fair hearings on method of payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 381.8 - Fair hearings on method of payment

State Regulations

An opportunity for a fair hearing shall be provided on
any issue relating to method of payment in accordance with department
regulations on fair hearings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
381.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
